name: Watchful Astromech
description: After you perform a {reload} or {rotate} action, if you are in an enemy ship's firing arc, you may perform a red {calculate} action.

name: Chopper
description:
Action: Spend 1 non-recurring {charge} from another equipped upgrade to recover 1 shield.
Action: Spend 2 shields to recover 1 non-recurring {charge} on an equipped upgrade.

name: Mynock
description: When attempting to jump to hyperspace, you may spend 1 {charge} to roll 1 additional attack die.

name: R4 Astromech
description: Decrease the diffculty of your speed 1-2 basic maneuvers ({sl}, {bl}, {s}, {br}, {sr}).

name: R3 Astromech
description: You can maintain up to 2 locks. Each lock must be on a different object. After you perform a {lock} action, you may aquire a lock.

name: R5 Astromech
description:
Action: Spend 1 {charge} to repair 1 facedown damage card.
Action: Repair 1 faceup Ship damage card.

name: R5-D8
description:
Action: Spend 1 {charge} to repair 1 facedown damage card.
Action: Repair 1 faceup Ship damage card.

name: R2 Astromech
description: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 {charge} and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

name: R2-D2
description: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 {charge} and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

name: Genius
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you have not dropped or launched a device this round, you may drop 1 bomb.

name: R4-B11
description: While you perform an attack, you may remove 1 orange or red token from the defender to reroll any number of defense dice.

name: R5-P8
description: While you perform an attack against a defender in your {af}, you may spend 1 {charge} to reroll 1 attack die. If the rerolled result is a {crit} result, suffer 1 {crit} damage.

name: R4-P Astromech
description: Before you execute a basic maneuver, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, while you execute that maneuver, reduce its diffculty.

name: R4-P44
description: After you fully execute a red maneuver, if there is an enemy ship in your {ab}, gain 1 calculate token.

name: Q7 Astromech
description: While you barrel roll or boost, you can move through and overlap obstacles.

name: R2-C4
description: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 evade token to change 1 {focus} result to a {hit} result.

name: R7-A7
description: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 {charge} to change 1 {hit} result to a {crit} result.

name: R4-P17
description: After you fully execute a red maneuver, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform an action, even while stressed.

name: R2-A6
description: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to a maneuver of the same bearing of a speed 1 higher or lower.

name: C1-10P
description: Setup: Equip this side faceup. After you fully execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform a red {evade} action, even while stressed. During the End Phase, if this card has 0 active {charge}, fip it.
flippedDescription: After you fully execute a maneuver, you must choose a ship at range 0-1. It gains 1 jam token.

name: R2-D2
description: After you activate, you may spend 1 {charge} and gain 1 deplete token to repair 1 damage card, recover 1 shield or remove 1 device at range 0-1.

name: R2-HA
description: While you defend, you may spend your lock on the attacker to reroll any number of your defense dice.

name: L4E-R5
description:
At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may transfer 1 calculate token to a friendly ship in your firing arc.
(Adds: {rotate}>{calculate})

name: R6-D8
description: While you perform an attack, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to the number of friendly ships at range 0-3 that have the defender in their {ab}.

name: BB Astromech
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform a {barrel} action.

name: M9-G8
description: While a ship you are locking performs an attack, you may choose 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker rerolls that die.

name: R1-J5
description: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform actions on damage cards even while stressed. After you repair a damage card with the Ship trait, you may spend 1 {charge} to repair that card again.

name: R5-X3
description: Before you activate or engage, you may spend 1 {charge} to ignore obstacles until the end of this phase.

name: R2-D2
description: During the End Phase, you may spend 1 {charge} and 1 shield to remove 1 red token. During the End Phase, if you have no active shields, you may spend 2 {charge} to recover 1 shield and gain 1 deplete token.

name: BB-8
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform a {barrel} or {boost} action.

name: Jamming Beam
description: Attack: If this attack hits, all {hit}/{crit} results infict jam tokens instead of damage.

name: Autoblasters
description: Attack: If the defender is in your {ab}, roll 1 additional die. During the Neutralize Results step, if you are not in the defender's {af}, {evade} results do not cancel {crit} results.

name: Heavy Laser Cannon
description: Attack: After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all {crit} results to {hit} results.

name: Tractor Beam
description: Attack: If this attack hits, all {hit}/{crit} results infict tractor tokens instead of damage.

name: Ion Cannon
description: Attack: If this attack hits, spend 1 {hit} or {crit} result to cause the defender to suffer 1 {hit} damage. All remaining {hit}/{crit} results infict ion tokens instead of damage.

name: Proton Cannons
description: Attack: Spend 2{charge}. Change 1 {focus} or {hit} result to a {crit} result.

name: Synced Laser Cannons
description: Attack: If you are calculating, the defender does not apply the range bonus.

name: Underslung Blaster Cannon
description:
After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may perform this bonus attack against it.
Attack ({lock}): Your dice can be modifed only by spending a default lock.

name: Ion Cannon Turret
description: Attack: If this attack hits, spend 1 {hit} or {crit} result to cause the defender to suffer 1 damage. All remaining {hit}/{crit} results infict ion tokens instead of damage.

name: Conner Nets
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1{charge} to drop a Conner Net using the [1{s}] template. This card's {charge} cannot be recovered.

name: Seismic Charges
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1{charge} to drop a Seismic Charge using the [1{s}] template.

name: Blazer Bomb
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1{charge} to drop a Blazer Bomb using the [1{s}] template.

name: Concussion Bombs
description: During the System Phase, if any of this card's {charge} are inactive, you must spend 1{charge} to drop 1 Concussion Bomb, if able, using the [1{s}] template. Otherwise, you may spend 1 {charge} to drop 1 concussion bomb.

name: Ion Bombs
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1{charge} to drop an Ion Bomb using the [1{s}] template.

name: Proton Bombs
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1{charge} to drop a Proton Bomb using the [1{s}] template.

name: Thermal Detonators
description: During the System Phase, you may spend up to 2 {charge} to drop that many Thermal Detonators using the [1{s}] or [2{s}] template. Each must be placed using a different template. When you reload this card, recover 1 additional {charge}.

name: Cluster Mines
description:
During the System Phase, you may spend 1{charge} to drop a Cluster Mine using the [1{s}] template.
This card's {charge} cannot be recovered.

name: Proximity Mines
description:
During the System Phase, you may spend 1{charge} to drop a Proximity Mine using the [1{s}] template.
This card's {charge} cannot be recovered.

name: Bomblet Generator
description:
During the System Phase, you may spend 1{charge} to drop a Bomblet using the [1{s}] template.
At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 shield to recover 2{charge}.

name: Electro-Proton Bomb
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1 {charge} to drop an Electro-Proton Bomb with the [1{s}] template. Then place 1 fuse marker on that device. This card's {charge} cannot be recovered.

name: Electro-Proton Bomb
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1 {charge} to drop or launch 1 DRK-1 Probe Droid using a speed 3 template. This card's {charge} cannot be recovered.

Adds: {barrel}, {focus}{to}!{barrel}

description:
Adds: {slam}{to}!{lock}
Setup: Equip this side faceup. During the System Phase, gain 1 disarm token unless you fip this card. At the end of the End Phase, if you have no active {charge}, fip this card.

name: Pivot Wing (Closed)
description: While you defend, roll 1 fewer defense die. After you execute a [0{stop}] maneuver, you may rotate your ship 90 or 180 degrees. Before you activate, you may fip this card.
flippedDescription: Before you activate, you may fip this card.

name: Repulsorlift Stabilizers (Inactive)
description: Setup: Equip this side faceup. Reduce the diffculty of your straight ({s}) maneuvers. After you fully execute a maneuver, you may fip this card.
flippedDescription: After you reveal a bank ({bl} or {br}) or turn ({sl} or {sr}), you must perform that maneuver as a sideslip, then fip this card. After you fully execute a non-sideslip maneuver, you may fip this card.

description:
Replace your Autothrusters ship ability with the following:
During the System Phase, you may perform a red !{boost} or red !{barrel} action.

Adds: {barrel}{to}!{evade}, {barrel}{to}!{lock}, !{reload}
Before you activate, if you are not critically damaged, you may fip this card.
flippedDescription:
Adds: {barrel}{to}!{lock}
After you attack, you may spend your lock on the defender to perform a bonus {cannon} attack against that ship using a {cannon} you have not attacked with this turn. Before you activate, if you are not critically damaged, you may fip this card.

name: Vectored Cannons
description: Gain a {at} indicator. Treat the arc requirement of your {af} primary attack as {at}. Replace your Vectored Thrusters ship ability with the following: During the System Phase, you may perform a red !{boost} or red !{rotate} action. You can rotate your {at} indicator only to your {af} or {ar}.

name: Gyro Cockpit
description: Gain {payload} slot. After you gain a stress token, you may spend 2{charge} to gain an evade token. When you drop a device, you may spend 1{charge} to set the template with its middle line aligned with the hashmark on the base in your {al} or {ar}.

name: Chopper
description: During the Perform Action step, you may perform 1 action, even while stressed. After you perform an action while stressed, suffer 1 {hit} damage unless you expose 1 of your damage cards.

name: Zeb Orrelios
description: While you perform an attack at attack range 0, you may spend focus tokens for their default effect to modify results. While defending at attack range 0, the attacker may spend focus tokens for their default effect to modify results.

name: Lando Calrissian
description: Action: Roll 2 defense dice. For each {focus} result, gain 1 focus token. For each {evade} result, gain 1 evade token. If both results are blank, choose either one.

name: Bo-Katan Kryze
description: After you perform an attack, if the defender was destroyed, each friendly ship at range 0-2 may remove 1 red or orange token.

name: Chewbacca
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 2 {charge} to repair 1 faceup damage card.

name: Sabine Wren
description:
Setup: Place 1 ion, 1 jam, 1 stress, and 1 tractor token on this card.
After a ship suffers the effect of a friendly bomb, you may remove 1 ion, jam, stress, or tractor token from this card. If you do, that ship gains a matching token.

name: Baze Malbus
description: While you perform a {focus} action, you may treat it as red. If you do, gain 1 additional focus token for each enemy ship at range 0-1, to a maximum of 2.

name: Hera Syndulla
description: You can execute red maneuvers even while stressed. After you fully execute a red maneuver, if you have 3 or more stress tokens, remove 1 stress token and suffer 1 {hit} damage.

description: If a friendly ship at range 0-3 would gain a focus token, it may gain 1 evade token instead.

description: Decrease the diffculty of your bank maneuvers ({bl} and {br}).

description:
Adds: {calculate}{jam}
During the System Phase, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-3. That ship gains 1 calculate token and 1 stress token.

name: Fenn Rau
description: Before a friendly ship at range 0-2 engages, if its revealed maneuver is 1 speed or higher and there is an enemy ship in its {af} at range 1, that friendly ship may remove 1 non-lock red token.

name: Ursa Wren
description: You can maintain up to 2 locks. Each lock must be on a different object. After a friendly ship at range 0-3 is locked by an enemy ship, you may perform a {lock} action.

name: C-3PO
description:
Adds {calculate}
Before rolling defense dice, you may spend 1 calculate token to guess aloud a number 1 or higher. If you do and you roll exactly that many {evade} results, add 1 {evade} result. After you perform the {calculate} action, gain 1 calculate token.

name: Leia Organa
description: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 3{charge}. During this phase, each friendly ship reduces the diffculty of its red maneuvers.

description: During the End Phase, if you are damaged and not shielded, you may roll 1 attack die to recover 1 shield. On a {hit} result, expose 1 of your damage cards.

name: Perceptive Copilot
description: After you perform a {focus} action, gain 1 focus token.

name: Saw Gerrera
description: While you perform an attack, you may suffer 1 {hit} damage to change all of your {focus} results to {crit} results.

name: Seasoned Navigator
description: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to another non-red maneuver of the same speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its diffculty.

description: Adds {coordinate}

name: Super Commandos
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1 {charge} to drop a Commando Team romote using the [1 {s}] template. You can place that device using its front or rear guides. This card's {charge} cannot be recovered.

name: ISB Slicer
description: During the End Phase, enemy ships at range 1-2 cannot remove jam tokens.

description: During the System Phase, you may spend 2{charge}. If you do, each friendly ship may acquire a lock on a ship that you have locked.

name: Captain Hark
description: After you fully execute a red maneuver, if you are not focused, you may spend 1 {charge} to gain 1 focus token.

name: Minister Tua

At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 0-1. If you do, you gain 1 calculate token unless that ship chooses to gain 1 stress token.

name: Agent Kallus
description: Immediately assign the Hunted condition to 1 enemy ship in play or on the mission deployment chart, then flip this card.
flippedDescription:
While you perform an attack against the ship with the Hunted condition, you may change 1 of your {focus} results to a {hit} result.
After that ship is destroyed, flip this card.

name: Gar Saxon
description: While a friendly ship at range 1-3 with an initiative of 4 or lower performs an attack against a defender you have locked, the attacker may change 1 {focus} result to a {hit} result.

name: Admiral Sloane
description:
After another friendly ship at range 0-3 defends, if it is destroyed, the attacker gains 2 stress tokens.
While a friendly ship at range 0-3 performs an attack against a stressed ship, it may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Ciena Ree
description: After you perform a {coordinate} action, if the ship you coordinated performed a {barrel} or {boost} action, it may gain 1 stress token to rotate 90Â°.

name: Moff Jerjerrod
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 2{charge}. If you do, choose the [1{bl}], [1{s}], or [1{br}] template. Each friendly ship may perform a red !{boost} action using that template.

name: Cikatro Vizago
description: During the End Phase, you may choose 2 {illicit} upgrades equipped to friendly ships at range 0-1. If you do, you may exchange these upgrades.

name: Tobias Beckett
description: Setup: After placing forces, you may choose 1 obstacle in the play area. If you do, place it anywhere in the play area beyond range 2 of any board edge or ship and beyond range 1 of other obstacles.

name: Boba Fett
description:
Setup: Start in reserve.
At the end of Setup, place yourself at range 0 of an obstacle and beyond range 3 of any enemy ship.

name: Qi'ra
description: While you move and perform attacks, you ignore obstacles that you are locking.

name: Unkar Plutt
description: After you partially execute a maneuver, you may suffer 1 {hit} damage to perform 1 white action

name: Zuckuss
description: While you perform an attack, if you are not stressed, you may choose 1 defense die and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the defender must reroll that die.

name: 4-LOM
description: While you perform an attack, after rolling attack dice, you may name a type of green token. If you do, gain 2 ion tokens and, during this attack, the defender cannot spend tokens of the named type.

name: Ablative Plating
description: Before you would suffer damage from an obstacle or from a friendly bomb detonating, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

name: Advanced SLAM
description: After you perform a {slam} action, if you fully executed the maneuver, you may perform a white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

name: Afterburners
description: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform a {boost} action, even while stressed.

name: Electronic Baffle
description: During the End Phase, you may suffer 1 {hit} damage to remove 1 red token.

description: Adds: {boost}

description: While you perform a {torpedo} or {missile} attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1 {charge} you spent as a cost for the attack.

name: Shield Upgrade

name: Static Discharge Vanes
description: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0-1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead, then you suffer 1 {hit} damage.

name: Stealth Device
description: While you defend, if your {charge} is active, roll 1 additional defense die. After you suffer damage, lose 1 {charge}.

name: Tactical Scrambler
description: While you obstruct an enemy ship's attack, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

name: Impervium Plating
description: Before you would be dealt a faceup Ship damage card, you may spend 1 {charge} to discard it instead.

name: Synchronized Console
description: After you perform an attack, you may choose a friendly ship at range 1 or a friendly ship with the Synchronized Console upgrade at range 1-3 and spend a lock you have on the defender. If you do, the friendly ship you chose may acquire a lock on the defender.

description: Action: Spend 1 {charge} to recover 1 charge on one of your equipped {astromech} upgrades. Action: Spend 1 {charge} to drop 1 spare parts, then break all locks assigned to you.

Other ships cannot spend your calculate tokens using the Networked Calculations ship ability.

name: Overdrive Thruster
description: While you perform a red {boost}, {barrel}, or {slam} action, you must use a template of 1 speed higher, if able.

name: Precision Ion Engines
description: Before you execute a speed 1-3 Koiogran Turn ({k}) maneuver, you may spend 1 {charge} to execute that maneuver as a Segnor's Loop ({sl} or {sr}) maneuver instead.

name: Mandalorian Optics
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1 {charge} to acquire a lock on an object in your {af}. While you perform a primary attack, if you have a lock on the defender, ignore obstacles beyond range 0 obstructing the attack.

name: Beskar Reinforced Plating
description: While you defend, if the attacker is in your {af}, before you would be dealt a faceup damage card, you may spend 1 {charge} to be dealt that card facedown instead, or spend 2 {charge} to discard it instead.

name: Burnout Thrusters
description:
Adds: {slam}
After you perform a {slam} action, lose 1 {charge}. Then you may gain 1 deplete token to remove 1 disarm token. If your {charge} is inactive, you cannot perform the {slam} action.

name: Advanced Sensors
description: After you reveal your dial, you may perform 1 action. If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

name: Collision Detector
description: While you boost or barrel roll, you can move through and overlap obstacles. After you move through or overlap an obstacle, you may spend 1 {charge} to ignore its effects until the end of the round.

name: Fire-Control System
description: While you perform an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during this attack.

name: Trajectory Simulator
description: During the System Phase, if you would drop or launch a bomb, you may launch it using the [5 {s}] template instead.

name: Passive Sensors
description: Action: Spend 1 {charge}. You can only perform this action in your Perform Action step. While your {charge} is inactive, you cannot be coordinated. Before you engage, if your {charge} is inactive, you may perform a {calculate} or {lock} action.

name: Advanced Optics
description: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 focus token to change 1 of your blank results to a {hit} result.

name: Ferrosphere Paint
description: After an enemy ship locks you, if you are not in that ship's {ab}, that ship gains 1 stress token unless it chooses to break its lock.

name: Hyperspace Tracking Data

name: Primed Thrusters
description: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform {barrel} and {boost} actions even while stressed.

name: Targeting Synchronizer
description: While a friendly ship at range 1-2 performs an attack against a target you have locked, that ship ignores the {lock} attack requirement.

name: Pattern Analyzer

name: Biohexacrypt Codes

name: Deuterium Power Cells
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1 {charge} and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield. Before you would gain 1 non-lock token, if you are not stressed, you may spend 1 {charge} to gain 1 stress token instead.

name: Automated Target Priority
description: While you perform an attack, you must choose a defender at the closest valid attack range. After you perform an attack that missed, place 1 calculate token on this card. Before you engage, you may remove 1 calculate token from this card to gain a matching token.

name: Sensor Buoy Suite
description: Setup: Before placing forces, place sensor buoy remotes. You may place 2 in friendly territory, 1 in neutral, and none in hostile. Buoys must be placed beyond range 2 of any edge. Before you engage, you may acquire a lock on a ship at range 0â1 of a friendly sensor buoy, ignoring range restrictions.

description: Attack ({lock}): Spend 1 {charge}. Change 1 {hit} result to a {crit} result.

description: Attack ({lock}): Spend 1 {charge}. If this attack hits, spend 1 {hit} or {crit} result to cause the defender to suffer 1 {hit} damage. All remaining {hit}/{crit} results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

description: Attack ({lock}): Spend 1 {charge}. Change 1 {hit} result to a {crit} result.

name: Plasma Torpedoes
description: Attack ({lock}): Spend 1 {charge}. During the Neutralize Results step, {crit} results are canceled before {hit} results. After this attack hits, the defender loses 1 shield.

name: Barrage Rockets
description: Attack ({focus}): Spend 1 {charge}. If the defender is in your {ab}, you may spend 1 or more {charge} to reroll that many attack dice.

name: Cluster Missiles
description: Attack ({lock}): Spend 1 {charge}. After this attack, you may perform this attack as a bonus attack against a different target at range 0-1 of the defender, ignoring the {lock} requirement.

name: Concussion Missiles
description: Attack ({lock}): Spend 1 {charge}. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0-1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

name: Homing Missiles
description:
Attack ({lock}): Spend 1 {charge}. After declaring the defender, the defender may suffer 1 {hit} damage to cancel the attack. If it does, skip the Attack and Defense Dice steps; the attack is treated as a hit.
AI behavior: The AI will choose to suffer 1 {hit} if it has only 1 health remaining or if it rolls 3 or more defense dice and the attacker cannot modify dice using green tokens.

name: Ion Missiles
description: Attack ({lock}): Spend 1 {charge}. If this attack hits, spend 1 {hit} or {crit} result to cause the defender to suffer 1 {hit} damage. All remaining {hit}/{crit} results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

name: Proton Rockets
description: Attack ({focus}): Spend 1 {charge}.

name: Energy-Shell Charges
description: Attack ({calculate}): Spend 1 {charge}. While you perform this attack, you may spend 1 calculate token to change 1 {focus} result to a {crit} result. Action: Reload this card.

name: Discord Missiles
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 calculate token and 1 {charge} to launch 1 buzz droid swarm using the [3 {bl}], [3 {s}], or [3 {br}] template. This card's {charge} cannot be recovered.

name: Diamond-Boron Missiles
description: Attack ({lock}): Spend 1 {charge}. After this attack hits, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, each ship at range 0-1 of the defender with agility equal to or less than the defender's rolls 1 attack die and suffers 1 {hit}/{crit} damage for each matching result.

name: Mag-Pulse Warheads
description: Attack ({lock}): Spend 1 {charge}. If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 {crit} damage and gains 1 deplete and 1 jam token. Then cancel all {hit}/{crit} results.

name: Electro-Chaff Missiles
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1 {charge} from this card to launch 1 electro-chaff cloud using the [3 {bl}], [3 {br}], or [4 {s}] template. Then place 1 fuse marker on it. This card's {charge} cannot be recovered.

name: Multi-Missile Pods
description: Attack ({calculate} or {lock}): Spend 1 {charge}. If the defender is in your {af}, you may spend 1 {charge} to roll 1 additional attack die. If the defender is in your {ab}, you may spend up to 2 {charge} to roll that many additional attack dice instead.

name: XX-23 S-Thread Tracers
description: Attack ({focus}, {calculate}, or {lock}): Spend 1 {charge}. If this attack hits, each friendly ship at range 1-3 of the defender may acquire a lock on the defender. Then cancel all dice results.

name: Cloaking Device
description: Action: Spend 1 {charge} to perform a {cloak} action. At the start of the Planning Phase, roll 1 attack die. On a {focus} result, decloak or discard your cloak token.

name: Contraband Cybernetics
description: Before you activate, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, until the end of the round, you can perform actions and execute red maneuvers, even while stressed. This card's {charge} cannot be recovered.

name: Deadman's Switch
description: After you are destroyed, each other ship at range 0-1 suffers 1 {hit} damage.

name: Feedback Array
description: Before you engage, you may gain 1 ion token and 1 disarm token. If you do, each ship at range 0 suffers 1 {hit} damage.

name: Inertial Dampeners
description: Before you would execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 shield. If you do, execute a white [0 {stationary}] instead of the maneuver you revealed, then gain 1 stress token.

name: Rigged Cargo Chute
description: Action: Spend 1 {charge}. Drop 1 loose cargo using the [1 {s}] template.

name: Coaxium Hyperfuel
description: You can perform the {slam} action even while stressed. If you do, you suffer 1 {crit} damage unless you expose 1 of your damage cards. After you partially execute a maneuver, you may expose 1 of your damage cards or suffer 1 {crit} damage to perform a {slam} action.

name: False Transponder Codes
description: After you acquire a lock on an object or an object acquires a lock on you, if you have 1 active {charge}, lose 1 {charge} and jam that object, ignoring range restrictions.

name: Babu Frik
description: Before you would gain a non-lock red or orange token, you may spend 1 {charge} to place it on this card instead. During the System Phase, if there are 1 or more tokens on this card, you must spend 1 {charge}. If you cannot, remove those tokens and gain matching tokens.

name: Overtuned Modulators
description: During the System Phase, if you are not stressed, you may spend 1 {charge} to gain 3 calculate tokens. During the End Phase, if your {charge} is inactive, for each green token you remove, gain 1 strain token.

name: Tracking Fob
description: Setup: After placing forces, choose an enemy ship in play or on the mission Deployment Chart and assign it the Marked for Elimination Condition. You ignore range restrictions while acquiring locks on this ship. If you have this ship locked when you attack it, it may not spend green tokens on defense.

name: Hotshot Tail Blaster
description: This attack can be performed at range 0. Attack: Spend 1 {charge}.

name: Composure
description: After you fail an action, if you have no green tokens, you may perform a {focus} action. If you do, you cannot perform additional actions this round.

name: Crack Shot
description: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your {ab}, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1 {charge} to cancel 1 {evade} result.

name: Daredevil
description: While you perform a white {boost} action, you may treat it as red to use the [1 {sl}] or [1 {sr}] template instead.

name: Debris Gambit
description: While you perform a red {evade} action, if there is an obstacle at range 0-1, treat the action as white instead.

name: Elusive
description: While you defend, you may spend 1 {charge} to reroll 1 defense die. After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1 {charge}.

name: Expert Handling
description:
Adds: {barrel}
While heavy fighters can often be coaxed into a barrel roll, seasoned pilots know how to do it without putting undue stress on their craft or leaving themselves open to attack.

name: Fanatical
description: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not shielded, you may change 1 {focus} result to a {hit} result.

name: Fearless
description: While you perform a {af} primary attack, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the defender's {af}, you may change 1 of your results to a {hit} result.

name: Heroic
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if you have only blank results and have 2 or more results, you may reroll any number of your dice.

name: Intimidation
description: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

name: Juke
description: While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender's {evade} results to a {focus} result.

name: Lone Wolf
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0-2, you may spend 1 {charge} to reroll 1 of your dice.

name: Marksmanship
description: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your {ab}, you may change 1 {hit} result to a {crit} result.

name: Outmaneuver
description: While you perform a {af} attack, if you are not in the defender's firing arc, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

name: Predator
description: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your {ab}, you may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Ruthless
description: While you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender. If you do, that ship suffers 1 {hit} damage and you may change 1 of your die results to a {hit} result.

name: Saturation Salvo
description: While you perform a {torpedo} or {missile} attack, you may spend 1 {charge} from that upgrade. If you do, choose two defense dice. The defender must reroll those dice.

name: Selfless
description: While another friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc, you may suffer 1 {crit} damage to cancel 1 {crit} result. If you do, gain 1 {xp}

name: Swarm Tactics
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

name: Trick Shot
description: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Treacherous
description: While you defend, you may choose a ship obstructing the attack and spend 1 {charge}. If you do, cancel 1 {hit} or {crit} result, and the ship you chose gains 1 strain token. After a ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, recover 1 {charge}.

name: Dedicated
description: While another friendly ship in your {al} or {ar} at range 0-2 defends, if it is limited or has the Dedicated upgrade and you are not strained, you may gain 1 strain token. If you do, the defender rerolls 1 of their blank results.

name: Snap Shot
description: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may perform this attack against it as a bonus attack. Attack: Your dice cannot be modified.

name: Proud Tradition
description: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may spend 1{charge} to perform {focus} actions even while stressed.

name: Deadeye Shot
description: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your {ab}, you may spend 1 {hit} result or change 1 {crit} result to a {hit} result. If you do, the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

name: Backwards Tailslide
description: While you boost or barrel roll, if your equipped {configuration} upgrade has the "(Closed)" side faceup, you can move through and overlap obstacles. After you boost or barrel roll through an obstacle, if you are not at range 0 of it, gain 1 evade token.

name: Ion Limiter Override
description: After you fully execute a red maneuver, you may perform a {barrel} action, even while stressed. If you do, roll an attack die; on a {hit} result gain 1 strain token, and on a {crit} result gain 1 ion token.

name: Marg Sabl Closure
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you moved through an obstacle, structure, or huge ship, or if you deployed, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your {af} at range 1-2. That ship gains 1 strain token.

name: Starbird Slash
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may choose 1 enemy ship you moved through. That ship gains 1 strain token. Then, if you are in that ship's firing arc, you gain 1 strain token.

name: Cutthroat
description: After another friendly ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, if that ship is limited or has the Cutthroat upgrade, you may remove 1 of your orange or red tokens, or recover 1 non-recurring {charge} on your ship card or one of your equipped upgrade cards.

name: Disciplined
description: After another friendly ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, if that ship is limited or has the Disciplined upgrade, you may perform a {lock} or {barrel} action.

name: Hopeful
description: After another friendly ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, if that ship is limited or has the Hopeful upgrade, you may perform a {focus} or {boost} action.

name: Tierfon Belly Run
description: You can perform special attacks even while at range 0 of asteroids. While you defend, if you are at range 0 of an obstacle, attack dice cannot be rerolled.

name: Feedback Ping
description: After a ship executes a maneuver, if it is at range 0-1 of a friendly device, you may acquire a lock on that ship, ignoring range restrictions.

name: Clan Training
description: Before you engage, if you are not focused and there is an enemy ship in your {af} at range 1, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform a red {focus} action. After you perform an attack, if the defender is destroyed, recover 1 {charge}.

name: Notorious
description: After you defend, if the attacker is in your firing arc, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, the attacker gains 1 strain token. While you perform an attack, if the defender is strained, you may reroll 1 blank result.

name: Enduring
description: While you defend, if you are not in the attacker's {ab}, {crit} results are neutralized before {hit} results. After you suffer {crit} damage, you may perform a {calculate} or {focus} action on your action bar, even while stressed, treating that action as red.

name: Heightened Perception
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 {forcecharge}. If you do, engage at initiative 7 instead of your standard initiative value this phase.

name: Instinctive Aim
description: While you perform a special attack, you may spend 1 {forcecharge} to ignore the {focus} or {lock} requirement.

name: Supernatural Reflexes
description: Before you activate, you may spend 1 {forcecharge} to perform a {barrel} or {boost} action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on your action bar, suffer 1 {hit} damage.

name: Brilliant Evasion
description: While you defend, if you are not in the attacker's {ab}, you may spend 1 {forcecharge} to change 2 of your {focus} results to {evade} results.

name: Predictive Shot
description: After you declare an attack, if the defender is in your {ab}, you may spend 1 {forcecharge}. If you do, during the Roll Defense Dice step, the defender cannot roll more defense dice than the number of your {hit}/{crit} results.

name: Battle Meditation
description: Adds: purple {coordinate}.

name: Foresight
description:
After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may spend 1 {forcecharge} to perform this attack against it as a bonus attack.
Attack: You may change 1 {focus} result to a {hit} result; your dice cannot be modified otherwise.

name: Precognitive Reflexes
description:
After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 {forcecharge} to perform a {barrel} or {boost} action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on your action bar, gain 1 strain token.
If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

name: Extreme Maneuvers
description: While you perform a {boost} action, you may spend 1 {forcecharge} to use the turn ({sl} or {sr}) template instead.

name: Compassion
description: Before another friendly ship at range 0-2 would be dealt a faceup Pilot or Crew damage card, you may spend 1 {forcecharge}. If you do, that damage card is discarded instead, and you are dealt 1 facedown damage card (gain 1 {xp}). Then, if you have 2 or more damage cards, recover 2 {forcecharge}.

name: Shattering Shot
description: While you perform an attack, if the attack is obstructed by an obstacle or the defender is at range 0 of an obstacle, you may spend 1 {forcecharge} to add 1 {focus} result.

name: Patience
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is an enemy ship in your {af}, you may gain 1 deplete token to recover 1 {forcecharge}.
